p: The aerial parts of S. echinata were collected on May 2017 in the sector Guchanama, canton of Celica, province of Loja, with coordinates 4°05′31″ S and 79°57′18″ W, at 2220 m above sea level. The botanical sample was identified by one of the authors (N.C.) and deposited in the herbarium of the Universidad Técnica Particular de Loja, with voucher number VMZ-120. The samples were collected under governmental permission (MAE-DNB-CN-2016-0048).
